CustomField.formula: IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Sales_Review_Rep_HA__c = TRUE, "Home Automation"+BR(),"")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Sales_Review_Rep_Pest_Control__c = TRUE, "Pest Control"+BR(),"")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Sales_Review_Rep_SO__c = TRUE,"Solar"+BR(),"")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Sales_Review_Rep_WA__c = TRUE,"Water"+BR(),"")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Sales_Review_Rep_WI__c =TRUE,"Window"+BR(),"")
CustomField.label: Automatic Text - Review
